title: DSA Level 7 â€” Binary Search Trees (BST)
intro: This level focuses on Binary Search Trees and their operations.
points: Understand the BST property: left subtree < root < right subtree.
Insert nodes into a BST while maintaining order.
Search for a value in a BST efficiently.
Delete nodes from a BST (concept and simple implementations).
Relate BST search performance to O(log n) in the average case.
